MESSAGE.name: DjVuCombine.bad_thumb
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Thumbnail size must be 0, or between 32 and 256 inclusively.

MESSAGE.name: DjVuCombine.failed_profile
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Failed to read the specified profile

BODY.MESSAGE: [1-%0!05u!] The requested file '%1!s!' does not exist.

MESSAGE.name: DjVuOCRMain.no_ocr_lib
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] No OCR library was found in your search path.

MESSAGE.name: DjVuOCRMain.only_single_page
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Only single page documents are supported

MESSAGE.name: DjVuFileList.no_ocr_lib
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Unable to find an OCR interface library

MESSAGE.name: DjVuReindex.already_new
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] This document is already in the new format.

MESSAGE.name: DjVuReindex.djvu_ext
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] WARNING: The new index name %1!s! does not have a .djvu extension.

BODY.MESSAGE:
Usage: (DjVu Version: %1!s!) %2!s! [options] <file1> <file2> ... <fileN> <%3!s!>
All files listed on the command line or in the optional filelist file are added to <%3!s!>. Files from other directories will be renamed if the names conflict with a file in the output directory.
Valid options include:

MESSAGE.name: --thumbsize
MESSAGE.value: %1!s!=<0,64-256> Specify the size of thumbnail images.

BODY.MESSAGE:
%1!s![=<OCROptionsString>] OCR all pages that have a bitonal layer.
If specified, the OCROptionsString is passed to the OCR Interface to set engine- specific options. The Expervision interface supports the following language recognition options: English, German, French, Dutch. These may be combined.
%4!s!: (DjVu Version %1!s!) Product Creation (CVS TAG): %2!s! Product Creation (CVS TAG): %3!s!
%1!s!=<filename> Specify a text file containing a list of input files.

MESSAGE.name: DjVuUsageMeter.unknown
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] UNKNOWN: Express Cartridge Manager Error 0x%1!x! returned.

MESSAGE.name: DjVuUsageMeter.corrupt_database
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] The Express Cartridge Manager database is corrupt (error 0x%1!x!). The database is located in %2!s!

MESSAGE.name: DjVuUsageMeter.database_missing
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] The Express Cartridge Manager database is missing. The database should be located in %1!s!

MESSAGE.name: DjVuUsageMeter.insufficient_units
MESSAGE.value:
[1-%0!05u!] You have insufficient pages in your Document Express Page Cartridge to encode this document. If you would like to purchase additional page cartridges, please go to http://expresscartridge.lizardtech.com with the following Express Cartridge Manager ID.
Express Cartridge Manager ID: %1!s!

MESSAGE.name: DjVuUsageMeter.no_db_path_win32
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] This product needs the Express Cartridge Manager to encode. Please install the Express Cartridge Manager.

MESSAGE.name: DjVuUsageMeter.no_db_path_unix
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Please set "LT_UMDB_PATH" environment variable to the path of your Express Cartridge Manager database directory.

MESSAGE.name: DjVuUsageMeter.pages_low
MESSAGE.value:
[1-%0!05u!] Warning: you are running low on Document Express Pages. If you would like to purchase additional page cartridges, please go to http://expresscartridge.lizardtech.com with the following Express Cartridge Manager ID.
Express Cartridge Manager ID: %1!s! Pages remaining: %2!d!.

MESSAGE.name: DjVuUsageMeter.database_busy
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Express Cartridge Manager is busy. Please try again.
